title: "Cyborg Lines"
content:
# Welcome to Cyborg Lines

Cyborg Lines is a website dedicated to providing minimalist wallpapers featuring single line drawings of cyborgs. Our wallpapers are designed to add a touch of futuristic style to your desktop or mobile device.

Our collection of wallpapers includes a variety of colors, from bright reds and blues to more subdued tones like black and white. Each wallpaper features a unique cyborg design, created with a single continuous line for a sleek and modern look.

Whether you're a fan of science fiction or just looking for a stylish new wallpaper, our collection has something for everyone. All of our wallpapers are available for free download in a range of resolutions, so you can find the perfect fit for your device.

We hope you enjoy browsing our collection and find the perfect cyborg wallpaper to suit your style.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A minimalist wallpaper with a single line drawing of a cyborg, in a striking color such as bright red or blue."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
